entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-02-17
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • CustomMain NativeAot test doesn't support cross-arch compilation #82320
  • GC events appear to be broken with NativeAOT #82318
  • dotnet seems to abort when libmsquic exist but cannot be loaded #82316
  • ObjectFactory should verify against a `null` serviceProvider #82315
    8.0.0
  • System.Text.Json: Utf8JsonWriter support for application/x-json-stream #82314
  • Implement permanent solution to integrate simd64 type to VecCon node #82312
    8.0.0
  • SafeHandle marshalling broken with Mono #82308
  • Missing symbols for only dotnet code #82306
    8.0.0
  • Enable TFM filtering for runtime's source-build #82298
  • High shmem usage in dotnet 7 runtime docker #82297
  • Strange boxing deopt #82291
    Future
  • Improvements of Random.GetItems<T> performance #82286
  • Potential deadlock during GC transition #82283
    Future
  • Error NETSDK1045 The current .NET SDK does not support targeting .NET 8.0. Either target .NET 7.0 or lower #82280
  • Assertion failed 'block->bbNext->bbJumpDest->bbFlags & BBF_FINALLY_TARGET' #82275
    8.0.0

Closed

  • Sub-optimal code generated for Unsafe.As #55064
    8.0.0
  • Cannot Tracert In MAUI Android but works fine in WinUI #78990
    7.0.x
  • CodeDom - CodeTypeReference - Invalid VB output for List<int>[] #80921
  • Compiler error CS0121 With .NET 7 in BitConverter.GetBytes #79034
  • [API Proposal]: System.String.TryGetChar(int offset, out char letter) #78570
  • [API Proposal]: <T>[].TryGetOffset(int offset, out <T> value) #78571
  • Different behavior after refactoring to `ArgumentNullException.ThrowIfNull()` #80516
  • [dotnet-sdk-8.0.100-alpha.1.22619.1] When IServiceProvider parameter is null in ActivatorUtilities.CreateInstance() method, "Value cannot be null. (Parameter 'provider')" exception will be thrown #79972
  • Regressions in System.Globalization.Tests.StringEquality #78969
  • Regressions in System.Tests.Perf_String #78517
  • Vector{128|256}.IsHardwareAccelerated return false when read via reflection #79795
  • Regressions in System.Numerics.Tests.Perf_VectorOf #78039
  • Math(F) Cbrt performance #11554
    Future
  • Perform assembly signature verification in .Net 6 #82288
  • Workaround for providing support for System.Exception with System.Text.Json #82293
  • Is there a Blazor WebAssembly Firefox support issue for tracking? #82290
  • SupportedLinuxPlatforms_IsSupportedIsTrue fails on distros without quic #82077
    8.0.0
  • How to set the maximum memory usage of a .net program #81872
  • System.IO.Ports.SerialPort in NET 6 randomly scrambles the byte order of an input stream #65080
    Future
  • Null-Conditional operator not functioning correctlly in Razor/Blazor and debugging in Edge is dying sometimes. #77542
    8.0.0
  • [IGNORE] Testing issue-labeler #82278
  • CS8032 for Microsoft.Extensions.Logging.Abstractions with 5.0.100 SDK #82274

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix FnPtrTypeDesc::GetManagedClassObject #82325
    area-System.Reflection
  • Remove the defunct DiagnosticUtility/Fx classes from DataContractSerialization #82324
    area-Serialization
  • [release/7.0] Install native dependencies on all Apple OS in CI #82323
    area-Infrastructure, community-contribution
  • [release/6.0] Install native dependencies on all Apple OS in CI #82322
    area-Infrastructure, community-contribution
  • Disable System.Reflection.Tests.TypeDelegatorTests.FunctionPointers #82321
    area-System.Reflection
  • [NativeAOT] Implement thunk page generation and mapping for iOS-like platforms #82317
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [tests] Retain OutDir for ioslike tests #82313
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Add new System.ComponentModel.DataAnnotations features #82311
    area-System.ComponentModel.DataAnnotations, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Expose missing BinaryPrimitives APIs #82310
    area-System.Buffers, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Revert "update alpine test images" #82309
    area-System.Net.Quic
  • Run NativeAot tests on arm64 #82307
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Clean-up generators.targets #82304
    area-Infrastructure
  • Include LibraryImportGenerator in WindowsDesktop transport package #82303
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Fix processing of x86 test results #82301
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, community-contribution
  • add source-build pre-built detection #82300
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Initial Patch for RISC-V support #82294
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Fix passing Mac Catalyst -target flag to .mm builds #82292
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Fix BuildAsStandalone=true for tests in merged groups #82287
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, test-bug
  • add RID for Ubuntu 23.04 #82284
    area-Meta
  • [mono][wasm] Fix ldftn in AOT mode, it should return a ftndesc. #82282
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • [release/7.0] Fix disposing root X.509 certificate prematurely for OCSP stapling #82277
    Servicing-consider, area-System.Net.Security
  • [JIT] X86 - Always skip emitting 'and reg0, -1' on x86 #82276
    area-CodeGen-coreclr

Merged

  • [JIT] LclMorph `GT_IND(GT_LCL_VAR_ADDR)` => `GT_CAST(GT_LCL_VAR)` narrow-cast only #81454
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix for issue #80350 tracking runtime deficiencies in the presence of static virtual method reabstraction #80987
    area-VM-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Install native dependencies on all Apple OS in CI #82263
    area-Infrastructure, community-contribution
  • Remove some remnants of multi-module support #82046
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Add new proposed API to Ancillary.Interop #81063
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices
  • Directory.Build.props: define RuntimeConfiguration before it's used. #82302
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, community-contribution
  • Fix runtime-community pipeline #82265
    area-System.Net.Quic, community-contribution
  • Remove duplicate range check in VSB.Append(char) #82264
    area-System.Runtime, 8.0.0
  • [wasm] Disable function pointer tests on browser #82285
    arch-wasm, area-System.Reflection, 8.0.0
  • [mono][aot] Enable dedup by default for iOS #81319
    area-Codegen-AOT-mono, os-ios, 8.0.0
  • [mono][doc] The path of sdkmanager on android_sdk was changed #82256
    area-Meta
  • Fix disposing root X.509 certificate prematurely for OCSP stapling #82116
    area-System.Net.Security
  • Remove iossimulator_x86 from helix-queues-setup.yml #82244
    area-Build-mono
  • Fix ds-ipc-pal-socket.c Windows build. #77840
    area-Tracing-coreclr
  • [wasm] Better support for automated tests in jiterpreter; more opcodes #82281
    arch-wasm, area-Codegen-Jiterpreter-mono
  • [fabricbot] Treat needs-area-label as an area for Eric/Jeff #82279
    area-Meta
  • [iOS] Disable additional sourcegenerator tests #82184
    area-Infrastructure-libraries

Updated

  • Fix paths in "Stripping symbols" message #82215
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Initial support for zmm in .NET #80960
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-avx512
  • Add EventPipe library support to CrossGen2 #82200
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [wasi] bundle timezones into .wasm #82250
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-wasi, 8.0.0
  • Unify type instantiations in reflection emit #81518
    area-System.Reflection
  • Remove S.S.Permissions reference from S.C.ConfigurationManager #82259
    area-System.Configuration, breaking-change, needs-breaking-change-doc-created
  • JIT: don't optimize calls to CORINFO_HELP_VIRTUAL_FUNC_PTR for interface class lookups #82209
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [MONO] Implement GC.AddMemoryPressure in Mono #82121
    area-GC-mono
  • JIT: Lift remaining cmov restrictions by introducing GT_SELECTCC #82235
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 2117129 #81871
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [release/7.0][workloads] Backport UsingMobileWorkload change #82268
    area-Build-mono
  • Avx512 single kmask #82255
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [QUIC] Improved logic of listener AcceptConnection #82261
    area-System.Net.Quic
  • [tests] Stand up iOS arm runtime tests and enable tracing/eventpipe tests #79169
    area-Infrastructure-mono, runtime-mono
  • [Mono]: Add support for lazy runtime init in native-to-managed wrapper, similar to NativeAOT library build. #82253
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • Clean up hex formatting, vectorize Guid.TryFormat for UTF8 #81666
    area-System.Runtime, tenet-performance
  • [6.0] Check for pending IO in the portable thread pool's worker threads #82248
    area-System.Threading, 6.0.x
  • Optimize ReplaceLineEndings #81630
    area-System.Runtime, 8.0.0
  • WIP: Adding HelloiOS sample for NativeAOT #82249
    os-ios, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [android][ios] Add LibraryBuilder task to support aot library mode #81919
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Implementation of Lemire's nearly divisionless method #79790
    area-System.Runtime, community-contribution
  • Cleanup unmaintainable parallel logic with workers #77993
    area-System.Threading.Tasks, community-contribution
  • Adding more SIMD constant folding support #82190
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Update NativeAOT build integration targets to include ioslike platforms #82086
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Use cinc instead of csel when possible #82031
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Refactor common variables used for the "send runtime tests to helix" steps into a shared template that all of our pipelines that run runtime tests can use. #81926
    area-Infrastructure
  • Support nocheck prefix #81615
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Share test cases for NativeAOT #82216
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr, area-Tools-ILLink, 8.0.0
  • Wasi icu test #82233
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • Testmerging JIT/Directed #81969
    area-System.Reflection.Metadata
  • Split generic virtual method slot use and impl tracking #82222
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Combine ExecutionContext/CapturedContext fields in ManualResetValueTaskSourceCore #82181
    area-System.Threading.Tasks, tenet-performance, 8.0.0
  • [mono][interp] Add instrinsics for common Vector128 operations #81782
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • [workload] Upstream net7 manifest json and targets #82267
    area-Infrastructure-mono

entry.title: dotnet/runtimelab - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-02-17
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • Recent WASM package have some issues. #2196

PullRequests

Updated

  • Add Stream boilerplate source-generator and attribute #2185
  • NativeAOT-LLVM: Merge to August 2023 #2199

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-02-17
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Record information about the resolved global.json usage in the SdkResolver #30711
  • Using a ref property in an instance of a WinUI 3 XAML element (e.g. Window) causes a build error since XamlTypeInfo.g.cs get's improperly generated. #30708
  • ASP.NET MVC - view component fails to render via vc tag helper when build with .NET SDK 7.0.200 #30703
  • dotnet SDK 6.0.405 and 406 still requires dependencies after installing SDK+runtime in CBL-Mariner #30694

Closed

  • dotnet restore nor nuget restore CLI command evalute the Directory.Build.props file #30702
  • Concurrency problem creating dotnet tool manifests #30254
  • dotnet tool list -g failed when run multiple times simultaneously #15399
    Backlog

PullRequests

Created

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.1xx' => 'release/7.0.2xx' #30713
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Update branding to enable a hotfix release #30712
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.3xx' => 'main' #30706
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [Blazor] Fix `publish --self-contained` for Blazor builds. #30700
    Area-AspNetCore
  • Add tests for Nuget restore post action with the argument files #30693
  • Allow multiple loggers for VSTest command #30686
    Area-DotNet Test

Merged

  • Bump Newtonsoft.Json to 13.0.1 #30691
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.4xx' => 'release/7.0.1xx' #30679
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Merge preview1 #30707
    Area-Workloads
  • GenAPI: add workaround for IFieldSymbol.Name that has angle brackets #30572
    Area-GenAPI
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.3xx' => 'main' #30680
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [GenAPI] Add abstract modifier for an abstract event. #30672
    Area-GenAPI

Updated

  • #28518: Stop generating NETSDK1138 warning when OutputType is Library. #30612
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Do a two-phase publish to mimic VS behavior #29817
    Area-NetSDK
  • [GenAPI] Synthesize an internal default constructor for the type with implicit default constructor and the base type without. #30594
    Area-GenAPI
  • Introduce `Workload Clean`: Garbage Collection Component #30266
    Area-Infrastructure

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-02-17
entry.content:
Issues

Closed

  • Building Corelib in runtime triggers several asserts #63348
    17.6
  • [Automated] PRs inserted in VS build main-33417.173 #66943
  • Generate class - Invalid class generated #40605
    Backlog
  • Double clicking error in error list with file it is referencing closed does not open the file #40721
    Backlog
  • Remote exception handling (removing SoftCrashException) #40476
    Backlog
  • Use Implicit Type refactoring may break nullability #40594
    Backlog
  • VS 16.5.0 Preview 1.0 - AccessViolationException #40573
    Backlog
  • Show the block declaration when locating the matching bracket via Ctrl+] #40567
    Backlog
  • Need GetRequiredOperation helper #40505
    Backlog
  • VB.Net nullable enum intellisense not suggesting the enum #40498
    Backlog
  • Format align chain method calls in different lines #40343
    Backlog
  • intellisense explicit cast vs dot #40217
    Backlog
  • SyntaxEditorBasedFixAllProvider encoutered an error - NullReferenceException #40031
    Backlog
  • New PCL project wizard in VS uses dnxcore50 when ASP.NET Core 1.0 is checked #11823
    Backlog
  • System.AggregateException with innerException "A task was cancelled" trying to add reference to certain projects of a solution #13802
    Backlog
  • Use RHS info to suggest replacement names for `var` #17988
    Backlog
  • IDE0019 should match is/cast #39860
    Backlog
  • Line of code becomes too indented when deleting a preceeding blank line #39843
    Backlog
  • Using a constant interpolated string literal in ObsoleteAttribute changes behavior #66938
  • Inline hints display incorrect nullability when NRT's enabled #66937
  • Refactoring to introduce deconstructed local variable #39537
    Backlog
  • Format on Paste inserts two blank lines for every line of /// doc comments when newlines are only \r #546
    Backlog
  • Pasting code in front of Xml doc comments caused strange indentation. #2585
    Backlog
  • Call to non-existant Add() overload in collection initializer shows lambda completions #3522
    Backlog
  • MetadataAsSource doesn't regenerate files after formatting change #4206
    Backlog
  • C# snippet completion does not work above using directives #4606
    Backlog
  • Distinguish linked files in quick info #5349
    Backlog
  • Auto brace completion should support adding open brace when close brace is typed. #5497
    Backlog
  • Extract interface suggestions #5750
    Backlog
  • Interactive: Signature help not classified #6681
    Backlog
  • Preview Changes takes too long to classify when checkboxes #6722
    Backlog
  • Target type preselection: consider base types/implementations #6942
    Backlog
  • C# completion: preselect True and False for target typing #7122
    Backlog
  • Encapsulate field should preserve Unicode-escaped field names when possible. #7576
    Backlog
  • The C# identifier rename operation is not accepting "@" as a permissible character in an identifier #8118
    Backlog
  • Xml doc probably should follow the generated property after encapsulating field #8310
    Backlog
  • Auto completion should not propose a module or not newable type after new or as new #8311
    Backlog
  • Intellisense filtering with no matches is worse than Dev12 #8330
    Backlog
  • XML doc comment completion is case sensitive #8628
    Backlog
  • Visual Studio is missing the word completion function #9300
    Backlog
  • Conflicts resolved during rename should be formatted if appropriate. #10406
    Backlog
  • QuickInfo incorrectly assumes mouse position and cursor are in same context #10482
    Backlog
  • Allow to Switch Back to VS2013 Style XML Comment Outlining #10937
    Backlog
  • Transferring a document to Misc files loses all C# intellisense #11599
    Backlog

Updated

  • roslyn.visualstudio.newintegrationtests.workspaces.workspacesnetcore.projectproperties (vs2022) #64672
    17.5 P3
  • roslyn.visualstudio.newintegrationtests.csharp.csharperrorlistnetcore.errorlist #61367
    17.6 P3
  • [New API] stackalloc in IOperation #66833
  • Code folding disappears in ASMX files #22583
    Backlog
  • Unify editorconfig parsers #40774
    Backlog
  • BasicArgumentProvider.ImplicitArgumentSwitching is flaky #66533
    17.6
  • Default parameter value binding to property instead of type name (i.e. Color Color problem) #40045
    Backlog
  • Adjust SymbolDisplay member options behavior for interface members #66753
  • newintegrationtests.csharp.csharpaddmissingreference.verifyavailablecodeactions (vs2022) #64807
  • FixAllOccurrencesIgnoresGeneratedCode is flaky #56625
    17.5
  • WorkCoordinatorTests.AdditionalDocumentOpenedClosedEvents is flaky #64047
    17.5
  • local introduce variable is very inconsistent #39806
    Backlog
  • Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.NetAnalyzers warns that I should be using version 7.0.0; but there isn't a release version of 7.0.0 yet #65581
  • roslyn.visualstudio.newintegrationtests.visualbasic.basicargumentprovider.fullcycle is flaky #66596
    17.6
  • turn on CA1825 once roslyn-analyzer moves to new IOperation API #20864
    Backlog
  • flow into dotnet/runtime main blocked #66900
  • C# Task List doesn't display items #66872
  • Navigation to errors in files generated by a source generator in Roslyn from build output doesn't work in VS #66928
  • Behavior of "var" quickinfo and nullable reference types #63959
    Backlog
  • Test plan for "using aliases for any types" #56323
    C# 12.0
  • [dotnet-sdk-8.0.100-preview.1.23107.4] Custom class "Windows" result to its elements cannot be recognized in .NET 8.0 #66888
  • The analyzer assembly references version '4.6.0.0' of the compiler, which is newer than the currently running version '4.5.0.0' #66918

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix how we classify a dotted constructor call in find-refs #66942
    Area-IDE
  • Parse parameter list on an interface in error recovery mode #66940
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Primary Constructors
  • Merge main to features/UsingAliasesTypes #66936
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Parameterize tests in VisualStudioOptionStorageTests #66935
    Area-IDE
  • Update build.sh #66933
    Area-Infrastructure, Community

Merged

  • Do not suggest to remove discard, if it can lead to a compiler error #66879
    Area-IDE, Community, Next
  • Infer better base types in 'generate type' #66941
    Area-IDE, Next
  • WithFrozenPartialSemantics freezing linked documents #66904
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Fix OnInitialized #66747
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Ensure that files added are immediately hooked up to open buffers #66550
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Optimize checks in AnalyzerExecutor #66923
    Area-Analyzers, Next
  • Improve 'introduce variable for expression' when using tuples #66909
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Use WhereAsArray to avoid allocations in all/none cases #66922
    Area-Analyzers, Next
  • EnC: Avoid loading DiaSymReader unless Windows PDB is actually read #66901
    Area-IDE, Next

Updated

  • Merge main to features/lsp_configuration #66944
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Add more using-alias-to-type tests #66889
    Area-Compilers
  • Local state tracing instrumentation #66768
    Area-Compilers
  • Add 'ExpandValueTuple' as a misc symbol display flag #66929
    Area-Compilers
  • Allow LSP code action requests to set the (new) AllowGenerateInHiddenCode option #66917
    Area-IDE
  • Provide access to F# integration tests #66926
    Area-IDE
  • Fix workspace pull diagnostics #66886
    Area-IDE
  • Rename options to editorconfig like name #66899
    Area-IDE
  • Clean with authority #66925
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Use next sibling in SyntaxNode.GetChildPosition() if available #66876
    Area-Compilers
  • Fix MSBuildWorkspace report warnings as failure #66710
    Area-IDE
  • SymbolDisplay show modifiers for default interface implementations and static abstract members #66712
    Area-Compilers
  • Clean and rename FeatureOnOffOptions #66881
    Area-IDE
  • Update Program.cs #66931
    Area-Compilers, Community

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-02-17
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Blazor WASM, SSR and CDNs #46734
  • [ClientAssets] Support automagically consuming npm dependencies installed from package.json #46732
    Backlog
  • Perf regression: single_query #46730
  • Changing values on bound InputSelect keeps index selected and not the value #46729
  • Hot reload of scoped css in blazor not working for newly added css files #46728
  • Default ASP.NET 7 React SPA template can't start SPA server without PowerShell #46726
  • MAUI Blazor CSS Isolation not working after Publishing to Azure App Service (Linux) #46723
  • Odd difference: AcceptedAtRoute uses GetUriByAddress. CreatedAtRoute uses GetUriByRouteValues. #46722
  • Blazor Server RedirectToPage results in ambiguous multiple matches #46721
  • Azure SignalR HubConnection does not trigger onClose when ios device locks #46720
  • Deserialization error using [JsonPolymorphic] and [JsonDerivedType] attributes (WEBAPI) #46719

Closed

  • Blazor: Skip the initial validation for dynamically added form content #44433
  • Perf improvement: ApiCrudAddProduct #46686
  • Perf regression: fortunes_dapper #46626
  • StatusCodePages middleware returns both JSON Problem Details & plaintext content for responses to requests from browsers #45678
    8.0-preview2
  • Would be nice if Virtualized blazor component keeps a head and a tail of objects #46526
  • ObjectDisposedException when calling JS.InvokeAsync #46617
  • "Unobserved task exception in sender" in Asp.net core SignalR server #46706
  • PasswordHasher CompatibilityMode IdentityV2 not working in .NET 6.0 #45994
    8.0
  • can not use signalr `Clients` in thread? #45656
    Discussions

PullRequests

Created

  • Sections support #46727
    area-blazor
  • Fix AcceptedAtRoute link generation and add tests #46724
    area-runtime, area-web-frameworks

Merged

  • Introducing `IProblemDetailsService.TryWriteAsync` #46680
    8.0-preview2
  • Update to Alpine 3.16 #46563
    area-infrastructure, 8.0-preview2
  • Exclude regex and alpha constraints when SlimBuilder is used. #46227
    area-runtime, 8.0-preview2

Updated

  • Add short circuit in routing #46713
    area-runtime, community-contribution
  • Named pipe caching test #46515
    area-runtime, pending-ci-rerun
  • Defer search for dev cert until build bind time #46296
    area-runtime, pending-ci-rerun
  • Remove JsonSerializerOptions copy in ProblemDetailsJsonOptionsSetup #46716
    area-runtime
  • Add CssClass property to ValidationSummary #43928
    area-blazor, community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun
  • Add WebViewManager.Dispatch() method #46644
    area-blazor, * NO MERGE *
  • SDK Bump to `8.0.100-preview.2.23113.1` #46328
    area-infrastructure
  • Productize QuickGrid #46573
  • [blazor] startup sequence unification #46532
    area-blazor, blazor-wasm, 8.0
  • gRPC JSON transcoding: Fix known type messages in querystring values #46633
    area-grpc
  • gRPC JSON transcoding: Fix not supporting JSON name in querystring names #46624
    area-grpc
  • [AOT] Add Http.Results RouteValueDictionary overloads #46594
    area-runtime, area-web-frameworks
  • Add 'dotnet new' web item templates (razor view, api controller, mvc controller) #46714
    area-mvc
  • Implement request timeout middleware #46115
    area-runtime, community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun
  • Expand FromX support and add route vs. query param inference #46715
  • Add schema support infrastructure #46300
    area-identity, 8.0-preview2
  • Retry ServerReset_BeforeRequestBody_ClientBodyThrows test #46718
    area-infrastructure

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-02-17
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Entry ClearButton not taking color of text/hard to see #13432
  • Reinstate transform tests on iOS #13429
  • First item in a CollectionView/ListView behaves differently than the rest #13423
  • MauiApp.Dispose fails when an IAsyncDisposable service is registered #13422
  • Picker TextColor switches to default (black) on hover #13418
  • App crashes on startup when R8 shrinker is set in Maui - Release mode #13413
  • Setting ScrollView.Orientation has no effect on iOS #13412
    Backlog

Closed

  • FlexLayout not working after update #13074
    Backlog
  • Blazor JS interop [Bug] #1762
    .NET 8 Planning
  • Scroll problem when keyboard popup #13414
    Backlog
  • [Android,Windows]When the parent's IsEnabled Property is set to false, the touch of the child is getting triggered. #12278
  • [iOS] Debug / Deploy is broken when specifying custom build configuration #12299
  • Default ShellContent on Mac Flyout #13409
    Backlog
  • Basic UI is wrong on Windows #8438
  • Entry tint color not works in iOS and MAC #13416
  • Massive memory leak in CollectionView while scrolling #10560
    .NET 8 Planning
  • Memory leaks EVERYWHERE #12039
    .NET 8 Planning
  • Shell flyout background color does not change in .NET 7.0 #12325
    Backlog
  • .NET Maui IOS Release build does not contain iTunesArtwork? #12085
  • [Android] CheckBox styles not changing with AppThemeBinding #6253
    .NET 6 + Servicing
  • [Win][Mac] Secondary ButtonMask odd behaviour #10464
    Backlog

PullRequests

Created

  • Source Generator Cancellation #13433
  • move BootstrapHelper to Maui Core #13431
    partner/hot-reload-xaml
  • Expose BlazorWebView.TryDispatchAsync() API for access to scoped services #13425

  • Implement IAsyncDisposable on MauiApp #13424
    area/hosting 🧩
  • [Windows] Add helper method to get GetFirstChildOfType with null support. #13421
  • Include border size in windows MeasureOverride #13419
  • [iOS] Don't scroll more than the available scrollable space #13415
    area/layout 🔲, platform/iOS 🍎, layout-scrollview
  • Add legacy Grid method (and a better one) #13408
    area/layout 🔲, layout-grid
  • [RadioButton] Fix Issue with BorderWidth, Incorrect spacing in Default Control Template. #13407
    area/controls 🎮, control-radiobutton

Merged

  • Merge main to net8 #13430
    area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • Have Frame use MinimumHeight/Width for minimums instead of constraints #13336
    area/controls 🎮, control-frame
  • Use and clear a local nuget cache #13256
    area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • Add implicit package reference for Compat #13427
  • Add shell pages via controller instead of handler #13332
    area/shell 🐢
  • [CI] Fix the step to copy the metadata. #13420
    t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • [net7.0] Ensure flyout detail updated on Android Tablet side-by-side layout on navigation push of 2nd page #13394
  • [CI] Fix more paths in the packs.yml to work with the unified pipeline. #13417
  • [core] fix memory leaks in bindings #13327
    area/Xaml </>, area/perf 🏎️
  • [Windows] Fix Shell FlyoutBackground property #13132
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, area/shell 🐢

Updated

  • Fix flyout offset measurements #12480
    area/shell 🐢
  • Show keyboard on Android entry/editor/searchbar focus #12890
    area/controls 🎮
  • Update GridExtensions.cs to compatible with Xamarin #9891
    area/layout 🔲, community ✨, .NET 8 Planning
  • Geolocation: Add #nullable for Essentials Geolocation code #13371
    area/essentials 🍞, community ✨
  • Allow string property binding as Color source #9814
    t/bug, area/Xaml </>
  • Implement Keyboard on SearchBarHandler #9851
    t/bug, area/controls 🎮, control-entry
  • [Windows] Fix Button LineBreakMode property #10759
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, area/controls 🎮, control-button
  • [macOS/iOS] Fix RequestedThemeChanged event #11199
    t/bug, area/Xaml </>
  • Shell routing and Service registration automation #13402
    area/shell 🐢, community ✨
  • SensorSpeed: unify sensor intervals across all platforms #13372
    area/essentials 🍞, community ✨
  • [Housekeeping] Alternative to #11795 #12134
    t/bug, platform/iOS 🍎, t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • Subscribes to the property chain upto the application for theme binding. #8957
    community ✨, area/theme
  • Fix Layout issues with the details page on Flyout #12909
    area/layout 🔲
  • Fix being unable to access some resources #11214
    area/Xaml </>, community ✨
  • [controls] fix memory leak in `Application.OpenWindow()` #13400
    area/perf 🏎️
  • [iOS] Fix Border Content clipping issues #10964
    t/bug, area/drawing ✏️, platform/iOS 🍎
  • 1100-Enhancement-DatePicker-supports-nullable-(Selected)-Date #9727
    area/controls 🎮, community ✨
  • Preventing NullReferenceException on WebAuthenticatorIntermediateActi… #12347
    area/essentials 🍞, community ✨
  • Avoid crash using BoxView visibility (avoid unnecessary parent) #11439
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, area/controls 🎮
  • [Android & iOS] Fix focus issues with DatePicker and TimePicker #13321
    t/bug, area/controls 🎮, control-datetimepicker
  • [Windows] Notify changes in CollectionView Layouts #13137
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, area/collectionview 📃
  • Simplification of user interface declaration in code #12728

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-02-17
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • HierarchId: Cannot call methods on varchar #30307
  • 8.0 API Reviews #30306
  • HierarchyId: Don't go through SqlBytes #30305
  • SqlException: Invalid column name 'ExceptionMessage'. #30304

Closed

  • SQL Server: Support hierarchyid #365
    8.0.0-preview2

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix to #28816 - Json: add support for Sqlite provider #30302

Merged

  • Index source code to source.dot.net #30303
  • Use Arcade's pool-providers.yml #30296
    area-infrastructure
  • SqlServer: Support hierarchyid #30291
  • Bump Microsoft.Azure.Cosmos from 3.31.2 to 3.32.0 #30272
    area-infrastructure, type-dependency update :arrow_up_small:
